author: joshd4078
content: Hey <#843176491386667018> ! We are so excited you are all here! We will be holding a kickoff meeting on Monday, June 10 at 3pm utc and everyone is welcome to join. We will be going over some of the details of the program, including mentor interactions. Please refrain from contacting mentors until then. We look forward to chatting with you all!

author: mariohavel
content:
Glad to hear from all of you excited to join this cohort! 

The week 1 starts next week and the whole thing kicks off with our initial call on Monday as Josh shared above. We will share all details and guidelines specifics there so please don't miss it and come to ask us questions.
